name: Carl (El fideo rubio)
description:
You wake up on an empty filthy room, you hear the  echo of a deep voice laughing, you have just a second to find  a hiding spot,but remember,

He chases you no matter where you go, is there even a escape from this place?

Controls
WASD: To move
Mouse: To look around 
E: For interactions ( hiding on lockers, beds, pick up keys, open doors )
LeftCtrl: Crouch ( you don't make noise while crouching)
